entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor performance/code-gen with struct enumerators, especially when containing ReadOnlySpan #71510
  • readytorun\tests\mainv1.csproj TestLoadR2RImageFromByteArray test fails on MacOS and Linux #71507
  • [NativeAOT] Replace IlcTrimMetadata on test projects #71506
  • Use readonly/scoped with existing ref structs that accept spans #71497
    7.0.0
  • Rename `up-for-grabs` to `help-wanted` #71496
  • iOS: crash when profiling dotnet-podcasts #71492
    7.0.0
  • ServiceProvider: InvalidOperationException not thrown for circular dependencies at runtime #71489
  • [mono] Investigate performance impact of using interpreter as the default fallback for generics instead of GSHAREDVT methods #71482
    Future
  • Unexpected behavior while comparing Math.Floor and Math.Ceiling of double when casted to integer #71481
  • Potential issues in RegexCache #71476
  • `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow` tests timing out on `coreclr Linux_musl arm` #71475
  • dotnet-dump makes process to double its used memory and fails #71472
  • [API Proposal]: SequenceReader<T>.TryAdvanceTo(ReadOnlySpan<T> delimiter) #71471
  • NoInt32OverflowInTheBufferingLogic timing out #71469
    Future

Closed

  • The Task.Id is not guaranteed to be stable across threads #71487
  • Investigate size increase for Android libmonosgen-2.0.so between net6.0 and 7.0 #68330
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Order and OrderDescending #67194
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change the nullable annotation of IParsable.TryParse / ISpanParsable.TryParse #71309
    7.0.0
  • Question: dependency injection how could I intercept the ServiceScope resolve #70882
  • Rolling build test failure: System.Private.Uri.Unit.Tests - iOSSimulator-Release-x64-Mono_Release-OSX #67716
  • net6-ios: DateTimeOffset.Local does not have local timezone #69492
    6.0.x
  • [Arm64 Server Throughput] Address many-core scaling challenges #70528
    7.0.0
  • TarWriter does not throw an error when adding files to an invalid tar archive #71454
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Object> #70839
    7.0.0
  • CTS.TryReset method must be virtual #71494
  • X509Chain do not build chain online with a download certificate by HTTPS schema on Linux #70816
  • Reading the property "EnableBroadcast" on a "System.Net.Sockets.Socket" throws an exception and closes the socket #70555
    Future
  • CoreLibBinder asserts with certain static abstract in interface declarations #71441
    7.0.0
  • Obfuscate unstable native entry points? #71451
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsvalidation tests failing with AF: codeLength > 0 #69375
    7.0.0
  • RotateFlip for 1-bit image with the width of multiples of 8 #66871
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] nodejs on windows doesn't flush `stdout/stderr` streams on exit - with the `consolewasm` template #70675
  • JIT: BBF_HAS_NULLCHECK is not set on BB but is required #71193
    7.0.0
  • With .NET7 preview 6 SDK installed on Turkish OS, error happen when dotnet publish with AOT enable. #71149
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm][Threading] `garray.c:226: assertion 'array != NULL' failed` #70572
    7.0.0
  • Enable arm64 atomics for standalone GC #71221
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
  • [NativeAOT] Remove WaitForSuspend and some ordering cleanups. #71511
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP: Implement test checking whether CET is active #71509
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix get properties from an object of a library without pdb #71505
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improvements to loop hoisting #71504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use crypto.subtle for AES on Browser WASM #71501
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [wasm] JSImport, JSExport and related API types for JavaScript interop #71500
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Consume Roslyn with `ref` fields support #71498
    area-Meta, CoreClr, Mono, 7.0.0
  • Use llvm-objcopy with StripSymbols=true and clang #71495
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that CreateChecked, CreateSaturating, and CreateTruncating are publicly exposed #71493
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a few theoretical issues in Regex.CacheSize #71490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix crash in GSSAPI on macOS #71484
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Clean up debugger tests output #71483
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update ILToNativeMap event to include IL version #71479
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Log as error in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers #71474
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Basic support for stateless linear collection marshalling #71473
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update all internal marshallers that don't require pinning support to the new model #71470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • [wasm] Misc fixes for template projects #71468
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update Android Docker build image #68354
    area-Build-mono
  • Gather 'Tellurium' team issues in team project #68193
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Implement new metadata knobs as internal APIs #71449
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Improve LSRA and other dump output #71499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Adjust regions range dynamically based on memory limits #71164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add MaybeNullWhen attribute to IParsable.TryParse / ISpanParsable.TryParse #71381
    community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Exclude root folder's .md files as well from triggering CI #71404
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Relax Socket.EnableBroadcast getter exception behavior #70728
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Preparation for public API in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #71332
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • Fixing a typo in copying pdb files #71450
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use full path for rd.xml in ilc rsp file #71480
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve interoperability of NTLM encryption/decryption and authentication #71373
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/2 #71345
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - fixes for tests failing on CI #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Avoid introducing GT_NULLCHECK in gtTryRemoveBoxUpstreamEffects #71439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #71252 disable Atan2PiTest on Android x86 #71382
    os-android, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [wasm] InterpToNativeGenerator: use invariant culture when generating C #71460
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow specifying the in/ref/out marshaller scenarios for the generator factory #71466
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Use llvm-objcopy for regular and cross builds #71446

Updated

  • [custom_attrs] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one (#68266) #70346
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix: using default value for nullable enum parameter throws ArgumentException #71388
    area-System.Reflection
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exposing static bool IsSupported { get; } on Vector<T> and Vector64/128/256<T> #71240
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add new MultiSign APIs and address API review feedback on existing ones #71390
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    area-System.Configuration
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Version resilient cross module code compilation and inlining #71271
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable CA1727: Use PascalCase for named placeholders #71444
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71420
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder should support binding private properties from ba… #71039
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix crossgen2 version resilience test #71357
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Loop hoisting experiment #71407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some tests regressed by the aggressive reflection metadata trimming work #71440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactoring IShiftOperators to take a `TOther` #71405
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement new QuicException proposal #71432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • add basic support for SNI different than URI in H3 #71428
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/comm stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • Various cryptographic allocation improvements #71015
    area-System.Security
  • Obsolete Create(string) cryptographic factory methods #71230
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add a config to MIBC format #71359
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move _OOP_find_proc_info to libunwind #71465
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the zero-offset field sequence map #71455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Return receive flags from ReceiveMessageFromAsync on Windows #71462
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on LA #71327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add an ETW event for reporting some internal JIT data back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Introduce System.Runtime.TieredPGO knob #71438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add support for GetPinnableReference for the new marshaller shapes #71412
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Hot cold splitting] Support split-eh #1918

PullRequests

Created

  • R2RDump dump scratch table #1921

Merged

  • Disable compProcedureSplittingEH in debug #1922
  • Disable EH splitting by default #1920
  • Pull from runtime-main to enable EH splitting #1919

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK 6.0.301 breaks clean build with LibLog package #26404
  • Aliased packs are not resolved correctly from TargetingPackName/RuntimePackRuntimeIdentifiers in KnownFrameworkReference items #26384
  • Can't install dotnet tools; The process cannot access the file #26381

Closed

  • #18903 spelling is still not fixed #26021

PullRequests

Created

  • Trusted roots: May 2022 CTL #26403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove non-existent project path from dotnet-watch.slnf #26401
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Taskkill to kill any hanging dotnet processes left by debuggers #26400
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding test scenarios for publish AOT debug files #26392
    Area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx-preview6] Revert branding to p6 #26395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support wwwroot/.well-known in web/Razor publish output #26366
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [QB Mode] Fix Workload Restore Crashes #26405
  • Display manifest version inside of workload list #26326
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify caching logic to not try and retain caches between supression #26367
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26359
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestNavigateToDifferentProjects is flaky #62286
  • Visual Basic Move Static Members: Refactoring one of multiple fields incorrectly formats whitespace #62283
  • Disabling Quick Info integration tests due to CI flakeyness. #62280
  • Revise SyntaxGenerator for file types #62274
  • Are `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Location` instances safe to cache in Incremental Source Generators? #62269
  • New rename UI shouldn't show "Include overload(s)" for locals/params/properties/fields #62267

Closed

  • Intermittent build failures with "error CS0104: `X` is an ambiguous reference between `System.X` and `System.X`" #60259
    17.3
  • IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required should not be reported on file types #62259
    17.4
  • Severe ConditionalWeakTable contention observed on TryParseConversionOperatorDeclaration failure path #62238
    17.3
  • inconsistent back and forth rewrite of `SyntaxTree` and (plain) string sources #62276
  • Add option for diagnostics (squiggles/error list/etc.) to only check *visible* (not just *open*) files. #60652
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use-site errors for unsupported ref fields #62296
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Walk green-nodes in incremental-generator attribute-finding path #62295
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not strip underscore if the result name will be invalid #62290
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cache the hash in compilation options #62289
    Area-Compilers
  • Specify builder capacities in incremental generation to avoid wasted scratch arrays. #62285
    Area-Compilers
  • Always clear diagnostics when ending a debug session #62270
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add public APIs for opened and closed event handling for non-source d… #62271
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip TestNavigateToDifferentProjects #62287
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62293
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Revert "Add Move Static Member To Existing Type (#61519)"" #62284
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE, UX Review Complete, Next
  • Fix a race in CachingDictionary. #62248
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable flakey integration tests #62282
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Synch handlers with fix #62209
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove Skip-SymbolCheck suffix in insert.yml #62288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix add accessibility for file types #62275
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set capacity of builder to avoid expensive garbage. #62279
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62262
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62278
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Expand "use null propagation" feature to support additional common cases. #62250
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run the 'use null prop' analyzer/fixer on roslyn #62253
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62273
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62268
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62266
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow BatchNodes to reuse prior computed arrays if they would generate hte same value #62169
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Perform a lookahead rather than a parsing attempt in order to determine if current token starts a conversion operator declaration. #62240
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62263
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Give an error when a file type is used in a global using static #62258
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62299
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • faster git checkout #62255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Issue/38102 #62226
    Area-IDE, Community

    Area-Compilers
  • Delete some dead code in AbstractCreateServicesOnTextViewConnection #62256
    Area-IDE
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Theme The "Generate Overrides" Dialog #62244
    Area-IDE
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE

    Area-Compilers

    Area-IDE, Community

  • Convert CSharpSyntaxGenerator to be an incremental generator #54379
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch does not work in eng\dogfood.cmd environment #42509
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularFetchData_ScreenReader: NVDA is not announcing as column headers when focus lands on the column header. #42505
    7.0-preview7
  • Installer only get Shared in .\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #42503
  • QuickGrid throws InvalidOperationException when DateTime column has null value #42499

Closed

  • How to set SignInScheme in an application using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect on multiple IDPs #42493
    Discussions
  • Consider not excluding `.well-known/*` from publishing #42448
    7.0-preview7
  • CryptographicException on ProtectedBrowserStorage.GetAsync #42418
  • Web Assembly Prerender Not Rendered #42280

PullRequests

Created

  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • `CreatedResult` should accept null location #42502
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Respond to C# 11 upcoming changes #42500
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Cleanup CommonLibTests.vcxproj #42476
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Identity UI: Input forms' `form-floating` broken styles fixed. #42075
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview7
  • Accessibility: Specify role for button #42501
    area-identity, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Remove Pseudo-Headers From Public API #42496
    area-runtime
  • Introducing `I*HttpResult` interfaces #42385
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add File Id to IBrowserFile Interface #42480
    area-blazor
  • AuthN: Use single scheme as DefaultScheme #42497
    breaking-change, area-security
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Use AddAuthentication method instead of property on WAB #42494
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deal with the scenario of a handler on a virtual view being set to a new handler. #8456
    6.0-servicing
  • App crashes on startup in android when Code shrinker is set to r8 #8454
  • Border with shadows not working on iOS and Mac but works on Android and Windows #8452
  • ScrollView does not handle rotation well #8447
    6.0-sr3
  • Buttons (or clicking) don't seem to work properly in scrollviews #8446
    6.0-sr3
  • [Android] IsVisible property change won't work as expected via MVVM #8445
  • App does not deployed to local as well as remote iPhone #8444
  • navigation bar is displayed(the gray line) #8443
  • Sample Maui App fails to install on browserstack #8440
  • Application Style gets applied even though separate style provided #8439
  • Basic UI is wrong on Windows #8438
  • Android Picker (Theme Change BackgroundColor wont Update) Bug #8437
  • CarouselView scrolling slow if it contains CollectionView in Android app #8436
  • CollectionView is not updating SelectedItems bound property #8435

Closed

  • Application.Current.MainPage is null on application launch in windows #8403
  • docker run --publish 7080:7080 --publish 127.0.0.1:3370:3370 --rm --volume ~/.sourcegraph/config:/etc/sourcegraph --volume ~/.sourcegraph/data:/var/opt/sourcegraph sourcegraph/server:3.41.0 #8449
  • [Bug]iOS,Android: Grid not measured size by it's content #3832
    6.0-servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Merge property overrides when a new base type is set #28352
  • Unable to translate set operation when using concise C# records for projection #28350
  • Down with a Sequence generated in incorrect order #28349

Closed

  • Error with nested LINQ Select and AutoMapper ProjectTo #28334
  • How to remove orphans from the db context? #28345
  • Why does EF Core use nested select statements in all joins? #28252
  • Change Tracker events lost on pooled context #27473
    7.0.0
  • ChangeTracker: New event for "entity about to get tracked" #27093
    7.0.0
  • Add interception for DetectChanges/state changes #16256
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query expression interceptor #28351

Merged

  • Migrate FabricBot Tasks to Config-as-Code #28341
  • New ChangeTracker events #28297

Updated

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.0-preview2.22096.2 to 5.0.0-preview3.22168.1 #28325
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Custom aggregate translations #28110
